name: Galarian Runerigus
description: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.

attacks.name: Spreading Spite
attacks.effect: For each damage counter on this Galarian Runerigus, put 2 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Mad Hammer
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.
